Text: EasyJet (styled as easyJet; ) is a British airline, operating under the low-cost carrier model, based at London Luton Airport.

Triplets:<EasyJet

--------------------
Text: EasyJet:  It operates domestic and international scheduled services on over 820 routes in more than 30 countries.

Text: EasyJet:  easyGroup Holdings Ltd (the investment vehicle of the airline's founder Stelios Haji-Ioannou and his family) is the largest shareholder with a 34.62% stake (as of July 2014).
Triplets:<Stelios Haji-Ioannou

Text: EasyJet:  It employs nearly 11,000 people, based throughout Europe but mainly in the UK.
